hiveArticle.title: Extra Seat in Movie Theater, India
hiveArticle.body:
Indians have a tendency to not to go movie alone if it's not a blockbuster movie or if its not on the first day. So if you are going with your child and wanted an extra seat, you can book 2 seats in a 3 seat row with one seat as empty as shown below. 

http://imagehost7.online-image-editor.com/oie_upload/images/29122710YtghV7TMy/vwlXSEKEoUqC.jpg
